item.title: Be Like Water
item.description: Shapeless is a Scala library for generic programming. The name “Shapeless” comes from a famous Bruce Lee quote: Don’t get set into one form, adapt it and build your own, and let it grow, be like water. Empty your mind, be formless, shapeless — like water. Now you put water in a cup, it becomes the cup; You put water into a bottle it becomes the bottle; You put it in a teapot it becomes the teapot.
